verses.roman:
jagannāthera sevaka phere kārya-anurodhe
tāṅra sparśa haile mora habe aparādhe

synonyms: jagannāthera—of Lord Jagannātha; sevaka—different servants; phere—move about; kārya-anurodhe—because of different duties; tāṅra—of them; sparśa—touch; haile—if there is; mora—my; habe—there will be; aparādhe—offense.
translation: "The servants of Lord Jagannātha generally move about tending to their duties, but if they touch me I shall be an offender.
